Flow.description: Implements the one Process per object design pattern

value.stringValue: IF( AND(BEGINS([Lead].OwnerId, "00G"), [Lead].Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = "Pardot_Queue"), "0120g000000HrgJAAS", /*If Owner Type = Queue and Owner = Pardot Queue, set to NA*/ IF( AND([Lead].qRouting__c = "CPTRAVELEMEA", BEGINS([Lead].OwnerId, "00G"), [Lead].Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = "MastercardWebQueue"), "0120g000000HrgIAAS", /*If qRouting = Travel EMEA and Owner Type = Queue and Owner = Mastercard Queue, set to EU*/ IF( AND([Lead].qRouting__c = "CPTRAVELNA", BEGINS([Lead].OwnerId, "00G"), [Lead].Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = "MastercardWebQueue"), "0120g000000HrgJAAS", /*If qRouting = Travel NA and Owner Type = Queue and Owner = Mastercard Queue, set to NA*/ IF( AND([Lead].qRouting__c = "CPPAYABLESNA", BEGINS([Lead].OwnerId, "00G"), [Lead].Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = "WEX_Payables_Lead_Queue"), "0120g000000HrgKAAS", /*If qRouting = Payables NA and Owner Type = Queue and Owner = Payables Queue, set to Payables*/ IF( AND(BEGINS([Lead].OwnerId, "005"), CONTAINS([Lead].Owner:User.UserRole.DeveloperName, "EFS_")), "0120g000000HrgKAAS", IF( AND(BEGINS([Lead].OwnerId, "005"), CONTAINS([Lead].Owner:User.UserRole.DeveloperName, "_ASIA")), "0120g000000HrgGAAS", IF( AND(BEGINS([Lead].OwnerId, "005"), CONTAINS([Lead].Owner:User.UserRole.DeveloperName, "_AU")), "0120g000000HrgHAAS", IF( AND(BEGINS([Lead].OwnerId, "005"), CONTAINS([Lead].Owner:User.UserRole.DeveloperName, "_EU")), "0120g000000HrgIAAS", IF( AND(BEGINS([Lead].OwnerId, "005"), CONTAINS([Lead].Owner:User.UserRole.DeveloperName, "_NA")), "0120g000000HrgJAAS", "0120g000000HrgIAAS" /*Default remaining to EU as these are probably assigned to Clare Murphy*/ )))))))))

formulas.name: formula_17_myRule_16_A1_1768554157
formulas.expression: IF( AND(BEGINS({!myVariable_current.OwnerId}, "00G"), {!myVariable_current.Owner:Queue.DeveloperName} = "Pardot_Queue"), "0120g000000HrgJAAS", /*If Owner Type = Queue and Owner = Pardot Queue, set to NA*/ IF( AND({!myVariable_current.qRouting__c} = "CPTRAVELEMEA", BEGINS({!myVariable_current.OwnerId}, "00G"), {!myVariable_current.Owner:Queue.DeveloperName} = "MastercardWebQueue"), "0120g000000HrgIAAS", /*If qRouting = Travel EMEA and Owner Type = Queue and Owner = Mastercard Queue, set to EU*/ IF( AND({!myVariable_current.qRouting__c} = "CPTRAVELNA", BEGINS({!myVariable_current.OwnerId}, "00G"), {!myVariable_current.Owner:Queue.DeveloperName} = "MastercardWebQueue"), "0120g000000HrgJAAS", /*If qRouting = Travel NA and Owner Type = Queue and Owner = Mastercard Queue, set to NA*/ IF( AND({!myVariable_current.qRouting__c} = "CPPAYABLESNA", BEGINS({!myVariable_current.OwnerId}, "00G"), {!myVariable_current.Owner:Queue.DeveloperName} = "WEX_Payables_Lead_Queue"), "0120g000000HrgKAAS", /*If qRouting = Payables NA and Owner Type = Queue and Owner = Payables Queue, set to Payables*/ IF( AND(BEGINS({!myVariable_current.OwnerId}, "005"), CONTAINS({!myVariable_current.Owner:User.UserRole.DeveloperName}, "EFS_")), "0120g000000HrgKAAS", IF( AND(BEGINS({!myVariable_current.OwnerId}, "005"), CONTAINS({!myVariable_current.Owner:User.UserRole.DeveloperName}, "_ASIA")), "0120g000000HrgGAAS", IF( AND(BEGINS({!myVariable_current.OwnerId}, "005"), CONTAINS({!myVariable_current.Owner:User.UserRole.DeveloperName}, "_AU")), "0120g000000HrgHAAS", IF( AND(BEGINS({!myVariable_current.OwnerId}, "005"), CONTAINS({!myVariable_current.Owner:User.UserRole.DeveloperName}, "_EU")), "0120g000000HrgIAAS", IF( AND(BEGINS({!myVariable_current.OwnerId}, "005"), CONTAINS({!myVariable_current.Owner:User.UserRole.DeveloperName}, "_NA")), "0120g000000HrgJAAS", "0120g000000HrgIAAS" /*Default remaining to EU as these are probably assigned to Clare Murphy*/ )))))))))

value.stringValue: AND( ISPICKVAL([Lead].LeadSource, "Event - Marketing"), ISPICKVAL([Lead].Lead_Source_Subtype__c, "Akkroo Lead Capture"))

OR( AND( NOT(ISBLANK([Lead].RecordTypeId)), /*For BOCA Leads*/ NOT(CONTAINS("1st Call:Legacy:Import", TEXT([Lead].Call_Stage__c))), CONTAINS("Fleet Lead:Asia Corporate Payments Lead:AU Corporate Payments Lead:EU Corporate Payments Lead:NA Corporate Payments Lead:WEX Payables", [Lead].RecordType.Name), LEN([Lead].Lead_Owner_Profile__c) > 0, /*ONLY FIRE IF USER - NOT QUEUE*/ NOT(ISPICKVAL([Lead].Product_Service_Type__c, "Permits")), NOT(ISPICKVAL([Lead].LeadSource, "Existing SFDC Record")), [Lead].Lead_Owner_Profile__c <> "RTS Partners - F1" ), AND( NOT(ISBLANK([Lead].RecordTypeId)), /*For BOCA Leads*/ CONTAINS("1st Call", TEXT([Lead].Call_Stage__c)), CONTAINS("Fleet Lead:Asia Corporate Payments Lead:AU Corporate Payments Lead:EU Corporate Payments Lead:NA Corporate Payments Lead:WEX Payables", [Lead].RecordType.Name), LEN([Lead].Lead_Owner_Profile__c) > 0 /*ONLY FIRE IF USER - NOT QUEUE*/ ) )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_9
formulas.expression: OR( AND( NOT(ISBLANK({!myVariable_current.RecordTypeId})), /*For BOCA Leads*/ NOT(CONTAINS("1st Call:Legacy:Import", TEXT({!myVariable_current.Call_Stage__c}))), CONTAINS("Fleet Lead:Asia Corporate Payments Lead:AU Corporate Payments Lead:EU Corporate Payments Lead:NA Corporate Payments Lead:WEX Payables", {!myVariable_current.RecordType.Name}), LEN({!myVariable_current.Lead_Owner_Profile__c}) > 0, /*ONLY FIRE IF USER - NOT QUEUE*/ NOT(ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Product_Service_Type__c}, "Permits")), NOT(ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.LeadSource}, "Existing SFDC Record")), {!myVariable_current.Lead_Owner_Profile__c} <> "RTS Partners - F1" ), AND( NOT(ISBLANK({!myVariable_current.RecordTypeId})), /*For BOCA Leads*/ CONTAINS("1st Call", TEXT({!myVariable_current.Call_Stage__c})), CONTAINS("Fleet Lead:Asia Corporate Payments Lead:AU Corporate Payments Lead:EU Corporate Payments Lead:NA Corporate Payments Lead:WEX Payables", {!myVariable_current.RecordType.Name}), LEN({!myVariable_current.Lead_Owner_Profile__c}) > 0 /*ONLY FIRE IF USER - NOT QUEUE*/ ) )
